授業目的: This course is for business students and future leaders who want to understand the link between sustainability issues and business activities. The purpose of this course is to provide a practical understanding of marketing from a broader context of economic, social, and environmental issues. As the link between companies and consumers, marketing plays a critical role in promoting sustainable consumption and production.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:
1. Develop a practical understanding of sustainability issues and how they relate to businesses.
2. Recognize the role of marketing in promoting and driving sustainability within an organization, with customers and society.
3. Demonstrate a practical understanding of sustainable marketing strategies and sustainable consumer behavior.
4. Rethink marketing principles and practices in a broader context that balances people, planet and profit.
授業方法: Online Format. Lecture, discussion, group work and presentation.
